name: Tests
description: Project automates the process of tests creation. This process allows users enter all parameters and description of yourself without administrator.
author: Matveev Savva

scripts.td: npm run build-jsx && browserify js/main.js -d -o build/js/bundle.js && rm -rf js/components/**/*.js & rm -rf js/components/*.js
scripts.temptd: npm run build-jsx && browserify js/main.js -d -o build/js/bundle.js
scripts.min-css: cat style/bootstrap.css style/fileinput.css style/style.css style/font-awesome.min.css style/question.css style/section.css style/mapping.css style/media.css style/input.css style/checkbox.css style/group.css | cleancss -o build/style/style.min.css
scripts.min-css-windows: type style\bootstrap.css style\fileinput.css style\style.css style\font-awesome.min.css style\question.css style\section.css style\mapping.css style\media.css style\input.css style\checkbox.css style\group.css > build/style/style.min.css
